newsitem.title: JAPAN: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - April 2.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Top Japan business news - April 2.

text.p: Following are some of the leading stories in the Japanese press on Wednesday, as reported by Kyodo news agency.
-- Nippon Credit Bank Ltd (NBC) plans to sell branches and cut its workforce by 600.
-- Government will likely approve bill keeping U.S. forces on Okinawa land.
-- Tokyo Metropolitan government to radically cut storage periods for documents.
